Text:
Major 15.2 bug: when used to launch an intel Mac, the arrow keys don't work, preventing you from selecting any launch menu item other than default, which is machine harddrive -- therefore rendering the CD useless to you.

Version 15.1 did not have this problem.
Is this the same copy you can get from "hirensbootcd.org", or does it have something else? The ones Proteus rebuilds are about 2 GB in size.

"Rebuild" means adding the "non-free" or paid software to the BootCD, which the original author, ie, Hiren, has stopped providing (due to legal/personal issues).

This is done to ensure that no one will be able to blame Hiren, if the FBI comes up and tries to accuse him of piracy.
